title: Luke Huttons lamentation which he wrote the day before his death, being condemned to be hanged at Yorke this last assises for his robberies and trespasses committed. To the tune of Wandering and wauering [...]
author: Hutton, Luke, d. 1596.
notes: Verse - "I am a poore prisoner condemned to dye,".
Only known copy mutilated, affecting title.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
